response.overview: Laid Bare is a candid and emotionally charged solo show that delves into the life and career of the renowned entertainer. Known for his roles in Doctor Who, Torchwood, and Arrow, as well as his extensive work in musical theatre, Barrowman uses this platform to share personal stories, address past controversies, and showcase his musical talents.â€‹
response.title: John Barrowman - Laid Bare
